name: Character Controller Demo
description:
A demo for a character controller I made with Unity Engine. Inspiration for the movement in the character controller comes from games like Apex Legends and Titanfall that have fantastic player movement.

You can:

Walk/run/crouch. 

Jump and lean in different directions.

Climb walls and mantle ledges.

Slide (sliding downhill is infinite as long as the slope is steep enough).

Wall run and jump off while wall running.

Any tips, bug reports, or ideas to make it better would be appreciated.

Thanks for trying it!
